body.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 5 in 1 Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Ultralight Small Vacuum Cleaner with a HEPA Filter, for Hardwood Floors, Household， Pet Hair, Carpet, Stairts, Sofa, Car
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Straight Air Track Technology】The Keromee cordless vacuum cleaner adopts straight air track technology to avoid loss of suction, smoother air duct, stronger suction, more efficient cleaning, and real deep cleaning

【Multiple filtration system】This home vacuum cleaner adopts a HEPA filter, the outer layer of the cartridge is equipped with a protective steel mesh, which can filter pet hair finely and prolong the service life of the filter cartridge, releasing fresh and clean air.

【2 Modes Adjustable】 Keromee cordless stick vacuum has two adjustable modes of high power and low power, which can be switched with one button, easily adapting to environments such as hardwood floors, short-pile carpets, stairs, window sills, sofas, desks, and curtains

【Lightweight and Low Noise】 The ingenious structural design of Keromee engineers makes this stick vacuum cleaner weigh only 3 pounds, can be operated with one hand, and can be used as a handheld vacuum cleaner, and a noise reduction treatment is added to the tail, so the noise is less than 70 decibels.
【Fast-Charging Lithium Battery】 The keromee cordless vacuum is equipped with a 2600mAh lithium battery, which can be fully charged in 3 hours, freeing you from the trouble of frequent charging

5 in-1 Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaners KEROMEE BW520 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner Note: After cleaning the dust cup and filter element, make sure that the entire filter is dry when installing the filter element into the vacuum cleaner.Note: Please do not use it on fine decoration dust or water, so as not to damage the motor.After-sales service： Thank you for choosing Keromee vacuum cleaner, we provide one-year after-sales service for all vacuum cleaners. If you have any problem, please communicate with us directly, we will solve the problem for you as soon as possible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and perfect for seniors
reviews.reviewText: I'm a senior and have a low pile carpet throughout my apartment except for kitchen and bathroom.This vacuum works well in all areas. Very quick and east to clean!! I don't even like to store it in a corner or hide it in the closet. Looks nice. I paid over $150.00 for a stick vacuum about a year ago. I just put it out for the trash.It took me five minutes to put together.This could be a great gift for a wedding shower or a new home.Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light but efficient
reviews.reviewText: While looking for a lightweight cordless vacuum for my senior aunt who uses a cane to walk around her house, I happened upon this offer. After reading all the info, I ordered it as a gift knowing that if she didn't like it, Amazon returns are "no hassle" and easy. Turns out, she loves it. First of all, it is relatively light weight, assembles easily, maneuvers under furniture and tables and charges quickly. When it's time to empty the unit of accumulated debris, it can be a little tricky if your grip is compromised. You have to hold onto it with two hands. I found it easier to remove the pole that attaches the vacuum head to the unit before emptying. I just may order one for myself and move on from plugging in cords! Love the color too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: Not very powerful but gets the job done on hard surfaces and hard to reach places. Definitely convenient seeing that it’s cordless which is exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that it is so lightweight I got it for stairs but it's not what I thought it would be like. I thought it would have more suction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Vacuum for the price - picks up pet hair
reviews.reviewText: I need a lightweight vacuum to pick up pet hair on my hard floors. This vacuum does just that! If you are looking for something with major power, this is not that vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have bunnies at home. I was having to use a broom and dustpan to get in their pen to tidy up. This little vacuum cleans up so well!!! Good suction. Picks up droppings and hay. The hay doesn't clog the tube! I do empty the little canister often so it works at its best. The filter is metal!!! Tap it when you take it out and it's like new. It only takes seconds to empty. SO light. Easy to maneuver. Gets in all the crazy corners. It's so small I charge it in my bedroom and set it in the corner by my couch. You don't even notice it. If you have bunnies, or birds or cat litter boxes that constant tidying up can be so annoying. This is a game changer!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Only last six months
reviews.reviewText: It worked pretty good until it stopped charging after six months, and now it's useless. I even tried a couple different chargers. The suction isn't great for things besides dust and fur. I'm disappointed that it broke so quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our 3 year old's birthday because he loves his play vacuum. This is a great size and weight for him and it does a decent job so he can actually clean while playing. He loves to be helpful cleaning up crumbs in the kitchen as well. I put a small rope tie on the handle to hang it on a hook on the wall when charging. No complaints!

reviews.reviewTitle: Lightweight and does a good job!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something that was lightweight, easy to carry up/down stairsand would pick up dog hair, dust, bird feathers and seeds from my wood floors. So glad I picked this model as it does exactly that. This is not a model you would want to use on carpets though, as it wouldn't remove things like fur embedded on that type of surface.If you plan on using it everyday, charge it every few days as it's a small machine and will run out of juice quickly. Also I clean out the canister after each use.Overall it suits my needs perfectly.

I love this vacuum. It's cute and it works well for us. We have flooring throughout our house with no carpet except for an area rug in the living room.I would have given the vacuum 5 stars but it doesn't work on the rug, at all.The vacuum is lightweight. It's so simple to swap the attachments. And cleaning the canister, and filter are so easy!
simple, mini and easy to use

reviews.reviewTitle: Price too high for what it is
reviews.reviewText: It's quite quiet, easy to assemble, two powers, very light, works well, I love the color, and the fact that it's wireless, BUT: the charge really doesn't last long, and the charging time is quite long, not very solid, the power is not very strong(the first power cannot suck up a corn kernel, the second power does, but cannot suck up a long piece dried grass)But it's okay for crumbs, animal/human hairs, on floors and very short carpets (not tested on long carpets)So yeah, it works, but the price is way too high for the quality !(edit : I timed it, the battery only lasts 16 minutes on the highest power level, and the full charge time takes 3h37)
I love this. It is light and compact and I can easily clean up small messes
